text: Teresa Giudice was warned to stay on the couch as Kim DePaola made a surprise appearance on Wednesday on the first part of the RHONJ reunion. Show host Andy Cohen, 49, surprised the women toward the end of the one - hour episode by revealing Kim was joining them.'Ugh,'said Melissa Gorga, 38, who previously was the subject of rumors spread by Kim that became the genesis of Strippergate. Raucous reunion : Teresa Giudice quickly taunted surprise guest Kim DePaola on Wednesday during the first part of the The Real Housewives Of New Jersey reunion show'I guess they let the animal out of the cage,'said Teresa, 45, who confronted Kim during season eight for spreading rumors that she was cheating on her incarcerated husband Joe.
